MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA6 postcode area of Manley and Helsby, affecting properties in Peck Mill Lane, Manley Lane, Manley Quarry and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:26pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required to repair a ground conductor and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6pm on 31st March 2021.
